abstract: Rajat K. Gupta was “the illegal eyes and ears in the boardroom” for a friend on Wall Street, Raj Rajaratnam, prosecutors asserted Wednesday as they filed criminal charges.
snippet: Rajat K. Gupta was “the illegal eyes and ears in the boardroom” for a friend on Wall Street, Raj Rajaratnam, prosecutors asserted Wednesday as they filed criminal charges.

headline.main: With Gupta's Arrest, Insider Inquiry Goes Beyond Wall St.
headline.print_headline: With an Arrest, Government Case Moves Beyond Wall Street and Into the Boardroom
